title: Mordekaiser can kill the racing Scuttle Crab
body:
[](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/zX_ImS5AUBs/hqdefault.jpg)

Killing Scuttle Crab in Nexus Siege with Mordekaiser's W will actually kill it, permanently.

They tried so hard to stop ours after I killed theirs, so hard...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zX_ImS5AUBs

replies.body:
Mordekaiser's at it again with his bugs.
https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/777/286/bac.png

He is just enacting his revenge for not getting a rework
######Damn Morde breaking the 4th wall again

> [{quoted}](name=nelogis,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wLHP39AZ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-08-23T18:06:30.466+0000)
>
> He is just enacting his revenge for not getting a rework
> ######Damn Morde breaking the 4th wall again

There is a reason Riot named him the Master of Metal. Riot gave him so much 4th wall breaking power that he bugged their metal hardware and Riot decided they had to nerf him in-game to balance it out.

Not even Scuttle Crab
can stop Mordekaiser's buggy crap
Who is the guy who made a thread saying he had like 200 pages of morde bugs, he has to add this to his list and the probably numerous nexus blitz bugs yet to be discovered.
Nearlyn (his Reddit name) and its 291 bugs last counted. I don't know how many pages are in his Published book of Morde bugs

> [{quoted}](name=Mordepool,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wLHP39AZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-08-23T18:00:18.445+0000)
>
> Nearlyn (his Reddit name) and its 291 bugs last counted. I don't know how many pages are in his Published book of Morde bugs

Well, now it's 292 when you add this one.
Is there a link or should I just look up the user name?

Can probably just google something like "list of mordekaiser bugs" and it will appear.

Its way too damn long though.

My man Morde at it again.

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
I'm highly guessing that Riot already knows this, but prefers to ignore it alongside his hundreds of bugs til his rework.
Oh, so MORDEKAISER can kill the skuttle, but IVERN can't free the other mobs? I call bullshit.

This Anivia in the game I just played ended up killing the Scuttle as well.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzfmc1B1oIA&feature=youtu.be

i dont know how this post got upvote, every champ can kill scuttle, if you kill it 2 time it will completely be removed from game
